ai_resume_title: AI-powered, create your perfect personalized resume
ai_resume_desc: Use AI technology to easily craft a professional resume. No registration required, free forever, your data is safe, increasing your chances of success.
smart_identify_desc: Your resume shouldn't be broken across pages. Our smart one-page feature uses scaling and layout to present your full content clearly on one page.
one_page_desc: Supports generating cover letter templates matched to your resume, boosting your job application competitiveness and persuasiveness.
easy_customize_desc: All templates can be freely adjusted in layout, fonts, and colors to help you quickly personalize your resume.
dashboard_desc: Start exploring the AI resume builder and create your AI-powered resume.
theme_color_update_fail: Failed to update theme color, please try again later
education_description: Fill in your education history and related information
pleaseFillBasicInfo: Please fill position, company and start date first
start_fill_personal_info: Start filling in your personal information
name: Name

experienceForm.pleaseFillSkillsFirst: Please fill in your skills first

experienceForm.fillYourWorkExperience: Please fill in your work experience details

addTitleToResume: Add a title to your new resume
deleteConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this resume?
deleteConfirmDesc: Once deleted, it cannot be recovered. Please proceed with caution.
congratulations_ai_resume: Congratulations on creating your AI resume!
ready_to_download_and_share: Now you can download and share your resume with your friends and family.
